text: Sandra Kalniete (born 22 December 1952) is a Latvian politician, author, diplomat and independence movement leader. She was Foreign Minister of Latvia from 2002 to 2004 and as European Commissioner for Agriculture, Rural Development and Fisheries in 2004. In 2009, she became a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) for the European People's Party. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Latvian writers Category:Ambassadors Category:MEPs for Latvia Category:European diplomats
title: Sandra Kalniete
